actions.committee: Committee on Environment and Public Works
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

official_title: A bill to amend the Clean Air Act to prohibit the Federal government from requiring State plans to mandate trip reduction measures.

summary.text: Amends the Clean Air Act to provide that revisions of State implementation plans that provide for transportation control measures for Serious ozone nonattainment areas shall not be required to include trip reduction ordinances.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Clean Air Act to prohibit the Federal government from requiring State plans to mandate trip reduction measures.
